00001 #ifndef POISSONGAMMAFIT_HPP
00002 #define POISSONGAMMAFIT_HPP
00003 
00004 // File:    PoissonGammaFit.hpp
00005 // Description: 
00006 //
00007 //              Model:
00008 //
00009 //              d_i = Sum p_j * a_ji,  i=1..M,   j=1..N
00010 // 
00011 //              D_i  is count corresponding to true mean d_i
00012 //              A_ji is count corresponding to true mean a_ji
00013 //
00014 //              D is a vector of M observed counts (that is, over M bins)
00015 //              p is a vector of N parameters (that is, over N sources)
00016 //              A is a vector of vectors of size N x M counts.
00017 //
00018 // Created: 27-Jun-2005 Harrison B. Prosper
00020 #include <vector>
00021 
00022 typedef std::vector<double>  vdouble;
00023 typedef std::vector<std::vector<double> > vvdouble;
